graph_title: Adolescent birth rate (aged 15-17 years) per 1,000 women in that age group
indicator_name: Adolescent birth rate (aged 15-17 years) per 1,000 women in that age group
national_indicator_description: The indicator characterises the number of births to adolesents aged 15-17 over the reporting year
computation_definitions: The indicator defines the ferility rate of adolesents to 15-17 years of age.
computation_calculations: The indicator is calculated as the ratio of recorded births to adolesents 15-17 years of age over the specified year, per 1,000 women of the given age group.
comments_limitations: Source: records of Civil status Acts on births
